Apos.​Input.​ConditionSet
public
Apos.​Input.​ConditionSet

Combines a bunch of Condition to make complex condition sets.  Operates over conditions that are needed and conditions that must not be pressed.

Constructors
ConditionSet
public ConditionSet()

Empty ConditionSet.

ConditionSet
public ConditionSet(
List<ICondition> needCondition,
List<ICondition> notCondition
)

ConditionSet with initial values.

Parameters
needCondition
List<ICondition>

A list of needed conditions.

notCondition
List<ICondition>

A list of condition that must never be pressed.

Public Functions
AddNeed
public ConditionSet AddNeed(
Keys key
)

This implicitly creates a ConditionKeyboard.

Parameter
key
Keys

Adds a new needed key.

Returns

Returns itself for easy function chaining.

public ConditionSet AddNeed(
Func<MouseState, ButtonState> button
)

This implicitly creates a ConditionMouse.

Parameter
button
Func<MouseState, ButtonState>

Adds a new needed mouse button.

Returns

Returns itself for easy function chaining.

ICondition condition

ICondition

Returns

Returns itself for easy function chaining.

Pressed
public bool Pressed()
Returns

Returns true when all the needed condition are held and at least 1 triggers as pressed.  Always returns false when at least 1 not needed condition is held.

Held
public bool Held()
Returns

Returns true when all the needed condition are held.  Always returns false when at least 1 not needed condition is held.

HeldOnly
public bool HeldOnly()
Returns

Returns true when all the needed conditions were held and are now held.  Always returns false when at least 1 not needed condition is held.

Released
public bool Released()
Returns

Returns true when at least 1 needed condition is released and the other needed condition are held.  Always returns false when at least 1 not needed condition is held.

Private Variables
_needCondition
private List<ICondition> _needCondition

List of Condition that are needed.

_notCondition
private List<ICondition> _notCondition

List of Condition that must never be held.
